article_metadata.description: Republicans are frauds, according to New York Times editorial writer Paul Krugman. Both the House and Senate Republican budgets contain spending cuts and revenue increases that are pure fantasy, he writes.  They will never materialize and they will leave the federal government “several trillion dollars deeper in debt.” Here is the [...]
article_metadata.author: John C. Goodman
